lead_paragraph: A half-million foreign tourists, dozens of heads of state and the attention of the world's media. If there were ever a headache for anti-terror forces, it's the Olympics.

headline.print_headline: Rio Readies for Worst as Terror Threat Hangs Over Olympics
headline.main: Rio Readies for Worst as Terror Threat Hangs Over Olympics
